price: Mu by’ukuri iswala y’ijoro ni ingirakamaro (ku mutima) ndetse inatuma (umuntu atekereza ku magambo ya Allah, atuje).
arabic: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيۡلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡـٔٗا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِيلًا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna nāshi-ata al-layli hiya ashaddu waṭan wa-aqwamu qīlan
